Select items in the list (All, None, New, Acknowledged, or Suppressed).
Export event console data to an XML or CSV file. By default, the file is named events.Extension.

Configure the event console view:
Show severity row colors - Select to shade each event with a color associated with its severity.
Enable live search - When selected, live search is enabled in all search fields. De-select to disable live search.
Clear filters - Clear filter selections, returning to the default list.
Save this configuration - Save your custom event console by bookmarking it for quick access later.
Click to refresh the list of events, or select an automatic refresh interval (1, 5, 10, 30, or 60 seconds).
Select one or more status values (New, Acknowledged, or Suppressed) to filter the list of events.

Select one or more severity levels (Critical, Error, Warning, Info, Debug, or Clear) to filter the list of events.
Learn more about event severity levels.
